documentation.openlistDesc: Manage your cloud storage with OpenList
documentation.rcloneDesc: Command line program to manage files on cloud storage

messages.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?

notifications.copyFailed: Failed to copy logs to clipboard
notifications.copySuccess: Successfully copied {count} logs entries to clipboard
notifications.exportSuccess: Successfully exported {count} logs entries to file

viewer.logsWillAppear: Logs will appear here when services are running
viewer.noLogsMatch: No logs match your search criteria

config.clickToToggleFlags: Click on flags to instantly add or remove them from your configuration

flagDescriptions.allow-other: Allow other users to access the mount
flagDescriptions.allow-root: Allow root to access the mount
flagDescriptions.bwlimit-10M:100M: Set separate upload and download bandwidth limits
flagDescriptions.checkers: Number of checkers to run in parallel (default 8)
flagDescriptions.dir-cache-time: How long to cache directory listings (default 5m)
flagDescriptions.log-level: Log level: ERROR, NOTICE, INFO, DEBUG
flagDescriptions.vfs-cache-max-age: Max age of objects in cache (default 24h)
flagDescriptions.vfs-cache-mode-writes: Cache local writes, upload file contents after writing completes

config.name: Name

empty.description: Create your first remote configuration to start mounting cloud storage.
empty.title: No Remote Configurations

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the remote configuration "{name}"?
messages.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

tip.rcloneMessage: On Linux, rclone is not bundled with the application. Please install it using your package manager (e.g., sudo apt install rclone) or from https://rclone.org/install/
tip.webdavMessage: Before mounting remotes, please ensure WebDAV management for specific user is enabled in OpenList Core.
tip.winfspMessage: On Windows, you need to install WinFSP first to use mount functionality. Please download and install it from GitHub: https://github.com/winfsp/winfsp/releases

autoStartApp.description: Automatically start OpenList service when the application launches
autoStartApp.title: Auto-launch on startup(Immediate Effect)

api.description: Also use proxy for api.github.com URLs
api.title: Apply proxy to API URLs

ghProxy.help: Optional. Enter a proxy URL to accelerate GitHub. Example: https://ghfast.top
ghProxy.label: GitHub Proxy URL
ghProxy.title: GitHub Proxy

hideDockIcon.description: Hide the application from the Dock and only show in the menu bar tray (macOS only, requires restart)
hideDockIcon.title: Hide Dock icon (tray only)

openInBrowser.description: Use system default browser instead of built-in window
openInBrowser.title: Open links in external browser

showWindowOnStartup.description: Show the main application window when OpenList Desktop starts
showWindowOnStartup.title: Show main window on startup

confirmReset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? This action cannot be undone.
confirmReset.title: Reset Settings

config.openError: Failed to open rclone config file
config.subtitle: Configure rclone for remote storage access

settings.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

admin.help: Enter a custom admin password or click the reset button to generate a new random password. Click 'Save Changes' to apply the password to OpenList Core.
admin.passwordPlaceholder: Enter admin password or click reset to generate
admin.passwordUpdateFailed: Failed to update admin password. Please check the logs for more details.
admin.resetFailed: Failed to reset admin password. Please check the logs for more details.
admin.resetSuccess: Admin password reset successfully! New password has been generated and saved.
admin.resetTitle: Reset admin password to a new random value
admin.title: Admin Password

openlistBinary.help: Override the default OpenList core binary. Leave empty to use bundled binary.
openlistBinary.label: OpenList Binary Path

rcloneBinary.help: Override the default Rclone binary. Leave empty to use bundled binary.
rcloneBinary.label: Rclone Binary Path

rcloneConfig.help: Override the default rclone.conf location. Leave empty to use default path.
rcloneConfig.label: Rclone Config Path

customPaths.selectError: Failed to select file. Please try again or enter path manually.
customPaths.title: Custom Paths

dataDir.help: Optional. Specify a custom directory for OpenList data storage
dataDir.label: Data Directory
dataDir.selectError: Failed to select directory. Please try again or enter path manually.

port.help: Port number for the web interface (1-65535)
port.label: Listen Port

ssl.description: Use HTTPS for secure communication (requires SSL certificate configuration)
ssl.title: Enable SSL/HTTPS

autoLaunch.description: Automatically start OpenList Core service when the application launches
autoLaunch.title: Auto-launch OpenList Core on app startup

settings.subtitle: Configure your OpenList Desktop application
settings.title: Settings

update.subtitle: Keep your application up to date with the latest features and security improvements
update.title: App Updates
